metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9942 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A sandbox information disclosure exists in Twig before 1.38.0 and 2.xbefore 2.7.0 because, under some circumstances, it is possible to call the__toString() method on an object even if not allowed by the security policyin place.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-twig - 2.4.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: twig package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
